snippet.title: Hakuoki: Memories of the Shinsengumi (Nintendo 3DS) Trailer
snippet.description:
At the time when shogunate and imperial forces clashed for supremacy over Japan, Chizuru travels to Kyoto in search for her missing father. She runs into the Shinsengumi, a band of samurai warriors sworn to protect the shogun.

Chizuru soon learns that they too are looking for her father. What awaits them is more than just a typical missing person's case, as they face off against imperial soldiers and the supernatural!

But in the midst of all this madness, will sweet and innocent Chizuru find love?

- Rising Star Games brings this epic tale of love and honour, for the first time in Europe on Nintendo 3DS

- Discover the mystery of the Shinsengumi through six heart-pounding stories

- See the men of Hakuoki in 3D for the first time on the Nintendo 3DS

- Keep track of your romantic progress by checking your Affection Rating and Corruption Gauge

- Unlock a myriad of photos and movies from significant moments in the story
